Issue_Description: Development and staging environments running 24/7 instead of business hours only
90% on-demand instances vs 40% reserved instance industry standard
300+ unattached EBS volumes still being billed monthly
Compute instances 2-3X larger than actual utilization requires
Cross-region data transfer 5X industry average due to poor architecture
12 elastic load balancers with zero traffic for 6+ months
1200+ EBS snapshots older than 90 days with no retention policy
Redundant services across AWS/GCP/Azure with no clear workload strategy
Zero cost allocation tags making it impossible to track department spend
Reserved instances purchased but not utilized (wrong instance types)
8 RDS/Cloud SQL instances with <5% utilization for 3+ months
Azure workloads that could be consolidated to primary AWS infrastructure
Production workloads at peak capacity 24/7 with no auto-scaling configured
All S3/Cloud Storage using standard tier instead of lifecycle policies
200+ elastic IPs allocated but not attached to instances
